H0.text: Barnacles , crabs and lobsters belong to which class of marine life . Mollusca

H1.text: Barnacles , crabs and lobsters belong to which class of marine life . Echinodermata

H2.text: Barnacles , crabs and lobsters belong to which class of marine life . Chordata

H3.text: Barnacles , crabs and lobsters belong to which class of marine life . Crustacen

A4.text: Crustacea (crabs, lobsters, shrimps, prawns, barnacles) are invertebrate animals that constitute one group of arthropods that are traditionally a part of the subphylum Crustacea.

A5.text: The crustacean group can be treated as a subphylum under the clade Mandibulata.
